JobFullDesc: About the Role The Territory Lead is responsible for the operations of our Uber Eats business in our largest urban centers.   This is a role for a candidate who can balance operations and commercial knowledge, bring strong operations, and lead the overall cross-functional strategy for Uber Eats across the territory, accountable to the outcomes.  You’ll be responsible for operational excellence and maintaining and continuously improving Uber quality throughout the Eater, Restaurant, and Delivery Partner experience and championing the needs of your market.  We are looking for leaders that are visionaries and can build, coach and inspire high performing teams to reach their potential. We believe in building globally and living locally - so understanding your market and championing their needs is key. What You'll Do:Be our commercial leader for your territory, and build the best merchant network in your region.Develop local expertise of merchant, courier, and eater supply and demand within a large or complex geoLead team of Sellers and Account Managers to drive commercial strategy and prioritiesMake decisions to provide the best selection and experience within your territoryOwn performance of all sides of the market (merchant, courier, and eater)Build vision and strategy for winning CP1 in your cityContribute and actively participate as a key member of the Territory Leadership TeamBasic Qualifications6+ years of relevant experience running Sales, Account Management or Operations, ideally in a matrix structureA minimum of 1+ years experience managing, inspiring, mentoring and supporting the growth of employees through inclusive and inspirational leadershipBilingual (French and English)Preferred QualificationsStrong interpersonal and / or commercial skills - Uber Eats is a B2B business and you will need to know how to build and maintain relationships with partnersStrong people management skills - you set the tone for your team; driving towards results while also being empathetic to their challenges - EQ is a must-haveDisciplined organizational skills - you’ll need to prioritize and manage hundreds of ongoing processes and projects simultaneouslyData-driven decision mentality and sound business judgment through strong analytical thinking
